name: Beach Life
description: Wine version 2.21 under playonlinux with directx 9
notes:
was running under UBUNTU 12.04 with wine 2.21
but no more with UBUNTU 18.08

files.file_installer: N/A:Please select the Beach Life setup file

content:
files:
- file_installer: N/A:Please select the Beach Life setup file
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/beachlife.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
